hln.mod_twapi.doc_templates module¶

hln.mod_twapi.es_loader module¶

Module to load twitter stream data into ES index

hln.mod_twapi.es_loader.index()[source]¶

Indexes twitter stream data in ES

Loads twitter stream data using Scraper class from twapi_handler module, extracts relevant information as ES docs and bulk indexes the docs in ES index

Returns None

hln.mod_twapi.mappings module¶

hln.mod_twapi.twapi_handler module¶

Module to handle twitter api stream data

class hln.mod_twapi.twapi_handler.Scraper(init_scrape=True)[source]¶

Fetches tweets from twitter streaming api using tweepy module

count_per_page = 200¶

hln.mod_twapi.twapi_handler.convert_to_utc_time(dt_obj, utc_offset)[source]¶
